settings.contact_text_desc:
Store Information

We'd love to hear from you! Please use the form to send us your message or ideas, or simply pop in for a cup of fresh tea and a cookie:

QC: 1341 Rue Principale, Sainte-Julie, QC J3E 0C4
ON: 2090 Flos Rd 10 E, Elmvale, ON L0L 1P0

Email: info@cbico.ca
Toll-free: 1-800-468-9058

Opening Hours:
Monday to Friday: 9am - 5pm
